subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The new Yankee Stadium will host its first soccer game Sunday night, a match between Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain, carrying on a tradition that began at the old stadium in 1931.
snippet: The new Yankee Stadium will host its first soccer game Sunday night, a match between Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain, carrying on a tradition that began at the old stadium in 1931.
